Translations.Text: R. These (liter) est proofs this scripture; profound Quran
Certainly those disbelieved wish ili est submitters
Let them mangx gxu ceter blind wishful opini ili do gxi trov out
Ni neniam annihilated any community en accordance kun specif predetermined temp
end any community neniam advanced nor delayed
Ili dir O vi ricev this reminder vi est crazy
Why vi ne bring angxel vi est truthful
Ni ne send angxel specif funkci. Otherwise ne 1 respited
Absolutely ni revealed reminder absolutely ni konfit gxi
Ni send (messengers) vi communities en des preter
Cxiu temp messenger ir them ili ridiculed him
Consequently ili ne kred en him. This est sistem ekde generaci
Eben se ni opened por them gate into cxiel which ili grimp
Ili dir Our okul tromp. Ni sorcx
